author: News 3 Staff
title: chevron-right
text: {p}HEADLINE: Few showers late Saturday{/p}{p}LOW TODAY: 44{ } { } { } NORMAL LOW: 39{/p}{p}HIGH TODAY: 64{ } { } NORMAL HIGH: 56{/p}{p}We continue to be in a rinse and repeat forecast as the valley climbed into the 60s for the 20th time this December.{/p}{p}Scattered clouds will continue to move in overnight keeping temperatures on the mild side for this time of with a forecast low of 44degrees.{/p}{p}A weak area of low pressure will bring a few light showers across southern Nevada late Saturday with the highest chances for free water expected north and west of the valley.{/p}{p}A few hundredths of an inch are possible here in the valley along with 1-2\" of snow in the Spring mountains, mainly above 8,500 feet.{/p}{p}This system will quickly exit on New Year's Eve Day with slightly cooler than normal temperatures arriving in time for the New Year.{/p}{p}Highs on New Year's Eve and New Year's day should hold in the mid 50s with lows in the lower 40s under mostly cloudy skies.{/p}{p}A more potent storm system is on the way towards the later part of next week so stay tuned!{/p}{p}CURRENT SNOWPACK: UPPER COLORADO RIVER BASIN - 72% (113% last year at this time){/p}{p}LAKE MEAD TRACKER: Lake mead is currently at 1067 feet compared to 1043 feet one year ago today.{/p}{p}Total valley rainfall in 2023: 4.59\" (+0.47\" above normal){/p}{p}Total valley rainfall through December 29th, 2022: 2.13\" (-1.92\" below normal){/p}{p}AIR QUALITY - HEALTHY{/p}{p}POLLEN COUNT:{/p}{p}TREES: NONE{/p}{p}MOLD: LOW{/p}{p}GRASS: NONE{/p}{p}WEEDS: LOW{/p}{p}- Bill Bellis{/p}{p}If you don't want to stay up until midnight in Las Vegas to ring in 2024, you can say \"prost\" to the new year at {strong}{a href=\"https://www.hofbrauhauslasvegas.com/\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://www.hofbrauhauslasvegas.com/\"}Hofbrauhaus{/a}{/strong}!{/p}{p}Jessica Maass and Ricardo Laguna joined us to talk about how they'll get the party started early on Sunday.{/p}{p}HEADLINE: Few showers late Saturday{/p}{p}LOW TODAY: 44{ } { } { } NORMAL LOW: 39{/p}{p}HIGH TODAY: 64{ } { } NORMAL HIGH: 56{/p}{p}We continue to be in a rinse and repeat forecast as the valley climbed into the 60s for the 20th time this December.{/p}{p}Scattered clouds will continue to move in overnight keeping temperatures on the mild side for this time of with a forecast low of 44degrees.{/p}{p}A weak area of low pressure will bring a few light showers across southern Nevada late Saturday with the highest chances for free water expected north and west of the valley.{/p}{p}A few hundredths of an inch are possible here in the valley along with 1-2\" of snow in the Spring mountains, mainly above 8,500 feet.{/p}{p}This system will quickly exit on New Year's Eve Day with slightly cooler than normal temperatures arriving in time for the New Year.{/p}{p}Highs on New Year's Eve and New Year's day should hold in the mid 50s with lows in the lower 40s under mostly cloudy skies.{/p}{p}A more potent storm system is on the way towards the later part of next week so stay tuned!{/p}{p}CURRENT SNOWPACK: UPPER COLORADO RIVER BASIN - 72% (113% last year at this time){/p}{p}LAKE MEAD TRACKER: Lake mead is currently at 1067 feet compared to 1043 feet one year ago today.{/p}{p}Total valley rainfall in 2023: 4.59\" (+0.47\" above normal){/p}{p}Total valley rainfall through December 29th, 2022: 2.13\" (-1.92\" below normal){/p}{p}AIR QUALITY - HEALTHY{/p}{p}POLLEN COUNT:{/p}{p}TREES: NONE{/p}{p}MOLD: LOW{/p}{p}GRASS: NONE{/p}{p}WEEDS: LOW{/p}{p}- Bill Bellis{/p}{p}If you don't want to stay up until midnight in Las Vegas to ring in 2024, you can say \"prost\" to the new year at {strong}{a href=\"https://www.hofbrauhauslasvegas.com/\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://www.hofbrauhauslasvegas.com/\"}Hofbrauhaus{/a}{/strong}!{/p}{p}Jessica Maass and Ricardo Laguna joined us to talk about how they'll get the party started early on Sunday.{/p}
